spells.name: Living Steel
spells.description:
The target's Standard Melee Attacks gain +1 to hit, +1 AP, and Magical Attacks .

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Corruption of Tin
spells.description: The target suffers -1 Arm and loses Metal Armour.

spells.name: Chalice of Gold
spells.description:
The target gains one of the following Magic Items: Potion of Power Preservation, Potion of Healing, Dragon's Brew, Potion of Swiftness.
See the Common Potions and Scrolls.
Note: This spell allows a Character to have more than a single Scroll or Potion, including duplicates.

spells.name: Silver Spike
spells.description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 10, Area Attack(1√ó5), Direct Hit(Str 6, Multiple Wounds(D3)), Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Word of Iron
spells.description: The target gains +2 Arm and Metal Armour.

spells.name: Quicksilver Lash
spells.description:
The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks,Zeal(against Metal Armour).
These hits always wound on 4+.

spells.name: Altered Sight
spells.description:
The target's Offensive Skill is modified by [ùõº].
No model can be affected by more than one instance of each version of this spell simultaneously.

spells.description:
The target's Charge Speed and Mobility are set to [ùõº].

[ùõº]: 8"
[ùõΩ]: 4"

spells.name: Cosmic Scales
spells.description:
Melee Attacks [ùõº] the target can never hit nor wound on better than 4+.
[ùõº]: allocated against
[ùõΩ]: allocated by

spells.name: Thunder and Lightning
spells.description:
=1pt All hits are resolved with Str 6, AP 2, Lightning Attacks, Magical Attacks. The target suffers 3 hits. Before removing casualties, apply [ùõº]
[ùõº]: The target suffers 1 additional hit
[ùõΩ]: Select a new Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the target: it suffers 2 hits. Before removing casualties, select a 3rd Unengaged enemy unit within 6" of the 2nd unit: it suffers 1 hit.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.description: The target gains +1 Def and +1 Off.

spells.name: Immortal's Bane
spells.description: The target gains Divine Attacks, Magic Resistance(3).

spells.name: The Stars Align
spells.description: <font color='green!60!black'></font>.

spells.name: Fate's Judgement
spells.description:
The target suffers a number of hits equal to the number of Magic Dice on this turn's Flux Card.
Those hits are resolved with Str 4, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Augury of Triumph
spells.description: The target's side gains a bonus to its Static Combat Score bonus equal to the Game Turn number.

spells.name: Inescapable Doom
spells.description:
=1pt Mark a Health Pool in the target unit, which has to be Rank-and-File if possible. Place one ‚ÄúDoom‚Äù Token on the marked Health Pool, and one at the start of each friendly Magic Phase.
At the end of any friendly Magic Phase, if the target is Unengaged, the Caster may end the spell. If so, remove all corresponding Doom Tokens: for each removed token, the marked Health Pool suffers 3 hits with Str 6, AP 3, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Fountain of Youth
spells.description:
Choose one of the following effects for the target:
  • A Rank-and-File Health Pool of the target, without Solitary Raises 2 HP.
  • One Health Pool in the target Recovers 1 HP.
No single Health Pool can be chosen more than once in each Magic Phase.

spells.name: Entwining Roots
spells.description: The target suffers halves its Charge Speed and Mobility (rounding fractions up), and suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

spells.name: Veil of Mist
spells.description: All units within 12" of the target when the spell is cast suffer a -2 modifier to their Casting Rolls except spells with Augment and a -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.description:
The target gains +1 Res.
In addition, Melee Attacks allocated against it never wound on better than 4+.

spells.name: Shield of Thorns
spells.description:
The target gains Parry.
For each Standard Melee Attack allocated against the model that rolls a '6' to hit, the attacking model's Health Pool suffers one hit at the same Agility Step, with Str 4, AP 2, and Unmodifiable.

spells.name: Mud Slide
spells.description:
The target must immediately take a Dangerous Terrain(6+) Test, and treats Open Terrain as Dangerous Terrain(6+).
In addition, the target suffers -1 to-hit with its Melee Attacks.

spells.name: Whispers of the Veil
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

spells.name: Danse Macabre
spells.description:
The target gains Ghost Step.
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move(4 Mob).

spells.name: Chorus of the Damned
spells.description: The target gains Distracting(1) .

spells.name: Touch of the Reaper
spells.description:
Select one or two models in the target unit.
Each selected model suffers a single hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Spectral Blades
spells.description: The target gains Dying Blow, and its Standard Melee Attacks always have at least AP 3, and gain Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Soul Blight
spells.description: The target suffer 2D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks, Psychic Attacks.

spells.name: The Devouring Dark
spells.description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack( 3√ó2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Blood Curse
spells.description: The target suffers ‚àí1 Off and ‚àí1 Def .

spells.name: Hand of Glory
spells.description: The target gains Aegis(6+) and Aegis(+1, max. 3+).

spells.name: Pentagram of Pain
spells.description:
The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

spells.name: Umbral Majesty
spells.description:
In each Round of Combat, one model in the target unit gains a ‚ÄúMajesty‚Äù model part, with Duration: Round of Combat. Select the affected model immediately before the ‚ÄúMajesty‚Äù model part allocates its attacks.
The ‚ÄúMajesty‚Äù model part has the following Offensive Profile:
Att 6, Off 9, Str 5, AP 2, Agi 8.

spells.name: The Grave Calls
spells.description: The target suffers 8 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description:
The target suffers 2D3 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Flaming Swords
spells.description: The target gains +1 to wound, Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting), Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

spells.name: Dragon's Roar
spells.description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack(Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack(2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable).

spells.name: Pyroclastic Flow
spells.description:
The target suffers 5D3 
	hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Pillars of Fire
spells.description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target are always Str 4 and AP 0, and gain Flaming Attacks,Magical Attacks, Automatic Hits.

spells.name: Tidal Flame
spells.description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 0, Area Attack(55), Direct Hit(Str 6, AP 2, Multiple Wounds(2)), Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Swarm of Insects
spells.description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks, and that always wound on¬†6+.
In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

spells.name: Savage Fury
spells.description: The target gains Fury,Fearless,Unruly,Frenzy.

spells.name: Awaken the Beast
spells.description: The target gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

spells.name: Predator's Instinct
spells.description: The target gains +3" Cha and Resistance(Ranged Attacks).

spells.name: Wild Guardian
spells.description:
Mark a Health Pool in the target. In each Round of Combat one model in the marked Health Pool gains a Guardian Model Part with the Duration: Round of Combat. Select which model immediately before the Wild Guardian allocates its attacks. A unit can never have more than one Wild Guardian Model Part. The Guardian model part has:
Att 4, Off 3, Str 6, AP 3, Agi 3.

spells.name: Totemic Summon
spells.description: Summon a Totemic Beast (see profile below), and immediately place it on the Battlefield using Ambush(Target Point).

spells.name: Smite the Unbeliever
spells.description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
‚ú†: choose an additional different target for the spell, following the normal targeting restrictions.
√ó: choose a new target for the spell, following the normal targeting restrictions.

spells.name: Light of Faith
spells.description:
The target adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side, and gains +1 Dis.
‚ú†: the target gains Courageous.
√ó: the target's Charge, Flee, and Pursue rolls are Minimised.

spells.name: Weight of Judgement
spells.description:
The target suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1, and ‚àí2 Def.
‚ú†: the target suffers -2 Off.
√ó: the target does not suffer ‚àí2 Def (i.e. it only suffers -2 Agi)

spells.name: Holy Affliction
spells.description:
The target suffers -1 to wound with its Melee Attacks.
‚ú†: the target suffers -1 AP
√ó: the target gains +1 AP

spells.name: Wrath of God
spells.description:
Place a marker on the target point. Do not roll for Divine Intervention when resolving the effects of this spell. You must roll for Divine Intervention at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase:
‚ú†: each unit within 2D6" of the centre of the marker suffers 2D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.
√ó: your opponent may move the marker up to 3" in any direction.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits. All other units within 3" of the target suffer 1 hit.
All hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Magical Attacks,Flaming Attacks,.
  • : increase the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.
  • : decrease the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

spells.name: Mind Fog
spells.description:
Each Range Attack made by the target that fails its to-hit roll is instead allocated towards the attacking model's Health Pool with Automatic Hits.
Each Standard Melee Attack made by the target that results in a to-hit roll of '1' to hit, is instead allocated back at allocated towards the attacking model's Health Pool with Automatic Hits.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description:
The next two hits the target would suffer are ignored.
If the target is hit by several simultaneous hits, the owner of the unit chooses which hits to ignore. (Hits that are multiplied into several hits (e.g. due to Fury or Area Attack) are ignored after multiplication.

spells.name: Illusory Paths
spells.description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:
  • The target gains Random Movement(2D6").
  • The target gains Random Movement(3D6").

spells.name: Shrouded Steps
spells.description:
The target gains Hard Target(1).
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move(6 Mob).

spells.name: Clouded Sight
spells.description: The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12" away from it.

spells.name: Cauldron's Curse
spells.description: The target gains Weakness.

spells.name: The Dead Arise
spells.description: Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target for the spell. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to the Rsr value of the unit. All models must be placed within the spell's Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

spells.name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
spells.description: The target gains Fearless. In addition, it may immediately perform a 5" Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

spells.name: Black Wing Totem
spells.description: The target gains  +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

spells.name: Blooded Horn Totem
spells.description: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

spells.name: Clouded Eye Totem
spells.description: The target gains Hard Target(1), Magic Resistance(3).

spells.name: Gnarled Hide Totem
spells.description: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting(1).

spells.name: Rune of Revocation
spells.description:
Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.
The target unit gains Magic Resistance(2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

spells.name: Rune of Reckoning
spells.description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

spells.name: Rune of Oaths
spells.description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

spells.name: Rune of Resolve
spells.description:
The target gains Swiftstride and, until the end of the Player Turn, it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may immediately perform a 4" Magical Move.

spells.name: Rune of Gleaming
spells.description: The target gains Distracting(1),Hard Target(1).

spells.name: Rune of Resilience
spells.description: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

spells.name: Astral Union
spells.description: The target gains Regeneration(6+) and Regeneration(+1, max. 3+).

spells.name: Arise!
spells.description:
Choose one of the following effects, for each target:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
  • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.
The following models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:
  • Height 4--5 models with Solitary.
  • Characters and models with War Platform.

spells.name: Hellfire
spells.description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 6, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.

*This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

spells.name: Guile and Fury
spells.description:
Can be cast in one of two versions: Augment: cannot be cast by Goblin. The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1".

Hex: cannot be cast by Orc. The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

spells.name: Forest Embrace
spells.description:
Place a Forest* underneath the target until the last model in the unit is removed as a casualty. This Forest always extends up to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

spells.name: Chains of Pride
spells.description: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

spells.name: Tempest of the Storm Witch
spells.description: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

spells.name: Spear of Infinity
spells.description:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack(1√ó5), Magical Attacks, Direct Hit(Str 4, AP 3, Multiple Wounds(2)).
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast before this spell in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

spells.name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
spells.description:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

spells.name: Favour of Meladys
spells.description:
=1pt The target gains 2 Protection Tokens, which are removed when the spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18" of the target suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, but before any Special Saves are taken, the target may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:
  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token (provided they are suffered simultaneously).
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

spells.name: Curse of Nezibkesh
spells.description: The target gains an Incendiary Marker. In addition, it suffers -1 Def and -1 Off, as well as an additional -1 Def and -1 Off as long as it has 1 or more Incendiary Markers.

spells.name: Breath of the Lady
spells.description: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

spells.name: Breath of the Steppe
spells.description:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ‚ü®Soft‚ü© {Hard} Cover.
The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (‚ü®2‚ü© {3}), even for models with Strider.

spells.name: Children of Umi
spells.description: All Melee Attacks allocated against the target suffer -1 to wound.

spells.name: Duty is Eternal
spells.description: The target gains +1 Res.

spells.name: Iovanis' Thunder
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll).

spells.name: Iovanis' Thunder
spells.description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks,Magical Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll).

spells.name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
spells.description: The target gains Fearless. The target may perform a 5‚Ä≥ Magical Move. This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules.

spells.name: Brace for Impact!
spells.description: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank

spells.name: On The Double!
spells.description: The target gains +1‚Ä≥ Advance Rate and +4‚Ä≥ March Rate

spells.name: Ready! Aim! Fire!
spells.description: The target gains Accurate

spells.name: Steady, Men!
spells.description: Discipline Tests taken by the target are subject to MinimisedRoll. A unit that receives this Order and passes a Rally Test doesn't become Shaken, and the Reform that is made after Rallying doesn't prevent the unit from moving and/or shooting (but it still counts as having moved for shooting purposes).

spells.name: Ullor's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

spells.name: Sunna's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Flaming Attacks. All enemy units in base contact with one or more targets of this spell when the spell is cast suffer D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Volund's Blessing
spells.description: The target's failed to-wound rolls with Melee Attacks must be rerolled.

spells.name: Ullor's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

spells.name: Sunna's Blessing
spells.description: The target gains Flaming Attacks. All enemy units in base contact with one or more targets of this spell when the spell is cast suffer D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Volund's Blessing
spells.description: The target's failed to-wound rolls with Melee Attacks must be rerolled.
